name: Catch the Countryballs
description:
Who said this would be easy?

Catch the Countryballs is a game where countryballs bounce around the map and your job is to catch them. To catch a countryball, click on it. Beware - they are fast! Each countryball gives points, and depending on the countryball it gives different amounts of points.

Ireland: 1-2 points.                                                                                                                                                      Germany: 3 points.                                                                                                                                                      Serbia: 5-8 points.                                                                                                                                                      Austria-Hungary: 15-25 points.

There will soon be a counter for how many of each countryball you have managed to catch. DO NOT USE AUTO-CLICKER.

If the game doesn't work (it currently doesn't) then play the Scratch version instead: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/750555197/
